sentence.Network_en: In Britain they call a shirtwaist a shirtwaister.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国人把“shirtwaist”(仿男式女衬衫)称为“shirtwaister”.

sentence.Network_en: His wife asked him to purchase a shirtwaist for her while in New York.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的太太叫他去纽约时给她买件衫裙.
